trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe base para elementos de um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework supplies two specialized classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, which represents individual elements, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>, which represents a series of grouped subelements.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework fornece duas classes especializadas que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement>: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, que representa os elementos individuais, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>, que representa uma série de subelementos agrupados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Esse construtor define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A> propriedade `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controle de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> associado a esse elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control that contains this element.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> controle que contém este elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when the element is associated with a different <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o elemento está associado a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> diferente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user interface (UI) state of the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado da UI (interface do usuário) do elemento.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values representing the state.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> que representam o estado.

trans-unit.source: The states specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> values are enforced by the UI but may be programmatically overruled.
trans-unit.target: Os estados especificados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> valores são impostos pela interface do usuário, mas podem ser ignorados programaticamente.
